message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
Thank you for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $9000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value and quality.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice! I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $8500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you the product for $8750. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice! I appreciate your willingness to compromise again. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $8250. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
